openpibo.modules.oled.board module¶

board - Define ids for available pins¶

See CircuitPython:board in CircuitPython for more details. * Author(s): cefn

class openpibo.modules.oled.board.Pin(bcm_number)¶

기반 클래스: object

Pins dont exist in CPython so…lets make our own!
